data.lyric:
[ti:White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Best Of Bing Crosby Christmas ]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]White Christmas - Bing Crosby (平克·劳斯)
[00:16.52]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[00:25.51]
[00:27.57]Just like the ones I used to know
[00:33.37]
[00:36.11]Where the treetops glisten
[00:40.91]
[00:42.01]And children listen
[00:45.41]
[00:46.74]To hear sleigh bells in the snow
[00:53.69]
[01:00.90]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[01:09.70]
[01:11.79]With every Christmas card I write
[01:16.89]
[01:19.62]"May your days be merry and bright
[01:28.64]
[01:33.67]And may all your Christmases be white"
[01:40.86]
[01:55.47]I'm dreaming of a White Christmas
[02:03.78]
[02:06.19]With every Christmas card I write
[02:11.44]
[02:14.69]"May your days be merry and bright"
[02:22.48]
[02:27.93]"And may all your Christmases be white"
[02:35.68]
[02:47.71]"May your days be merry and bright"
[02:56.77]
[02:58.27]"And may all your Christmases be white"
data.trans:
[ti:White Christmas]
[ar:Bing Crosby]
[al:The Best Of Bing Crosby Christmas ]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:16.52]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[00:25.51]
[00:27.57]就像我曾熟悉的那样
[00:33.36]
[00:36.11]树梢上的灯闪烁着
[00:40.91]
[00:42.01]孩子们聆听着
[00:45.41]
[00:46.74]奔跑在雪地上的雪橇的铃铛声
[00:53.69]
[01:00.90]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[01:09.70]
[01:11.79]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[01:16.89]
[01:19.62]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[01:28.64]
[01:33.67]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[01:40.86]
[01:55.47]我梦想着过一个白色的圣诞节
[02:03.78]
[02:06.19]我会亲手写下每一封圣诞卡片
[02:11.44]
[02:14.69]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[02:22.48]
[02:27.93]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[02:35.68]
[02:47.71]祝愿你们快乐开怀
[02:56.77]
[02:58.27]希望你们那里的圣诞节会下起雪
[03:09.26]
